channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NTSB investigating deadly crash of plane owned by Mötley Crüe's Vince Neil
item.description: An investigation is underway into Monday's crash of a private jet owned by Mötley Crüe frontman Vince Neil in Scottsdale, Arizona. At least one person...

item.title: Is it risky to open a CD with an online bank? What experts say
item.description: Online banks may offer better rates, but there are some potential drawbacks to take into account, too.

item.title: Shopify takes down Ye store selling swastika T-shirts
item.description: Shopify said Yeezy.com violated its policies by selling a shirt promoted by Ye, formerly known as Kanye West, emblazoned with a swastika.

item.title: Court dismisses appeal of Trump's classified documents case
item.description: Two weeks after the DOJ, under new leadership, moved to dismiss their appeal of President Trump's classified documents case, a court has formally dism...

item.title: Vance warns EU against AI overregulation at summit in Paris
item.description: In his first international address, Vice President JD Vance also argued AI must remain free from "ideological bias."

item.title: Trump rolls back standards for water-using appliances, light bulbs
Villagers offer support for a critical lifeline in rural Alaska days after plane crash kills 10
Spain to give legal status to 25,000 migrants affected by Valencia floods
Thai environmentalists upset as US revokes plastic straw ban
Judge says he will continue to pause Trump's federal buyout offer
item.description: A federal judge says he will continue to pause the Trump administration's federal employee buyout offer until he issues a ruling on a preliminary inju...

item.title: Steve Bannon pleads guilty in border wall fraud case
item.description: Steve Bannon, the confidante of President Donald Trump, pleaded guilty Tuesday to defrauding New Yorkers who donated to "We Build the Wall," an online...

item.title: Labour ploughs £400m into migrant deportation flights drive as it seeks to fend off Farage’s Reform
WATCH: Kayaker stalked by great white shark off New Zealand
item.description: A terrified kayaker documented his ordeal as a great white shark stalked him in waters off the coast of New Zealand. He managed to escape unharmed.

item.title: Top Justice Department official orders prosecutors to drop charges against New York Mayor Eric Adams
Migrants stranded in Mexico try to restart life after Trump eliminates legal pathway to US
item.description: Many migrants have been left stranded in Mexican border cities after the Trump administration immediately canceled tens of thosands of appointments ma...

item.title: Trump says he could withhold aid from Jordan and Egypt if they reject his Gaza plan
item.description: It comes as Jordan's King Abdullah is set to visit the White House Tuesday.

item.title: Canned tuna sold by major U.S. grocers recalled over botulism concerns
item.description: Certain tuna products may have defective lids that could lead to "a potentially fatal form of food poisoning," FDA notice states.

item.title: A Colorado electronics repair shop has filed more than 85 lawsuits against customers — but they’re fighting back
